title: drag & drop folder does not work
body:
### expected behaviour
if i select to upload a folder using drag&drop, folder gets uploaded

### actual behaviour
when i select to upload a folder by drag&drop, folder does not get uploaded

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version
2. drag a folder from a file explorer
3. drop it on owncloud server

note: files are uploaded correctly using drag&drop

### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","versionstring":"5.0.7 enterprise rc1,"edition":"enterprise beta"} 
open suse 12.2 
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: ff, chrome and safari 

operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
#### web server error log

debug	 core	 include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	 june 17, 2013 14:11
